DOC.brief_summary: To proof patient ' benefit minimally invasive surgery dorsal cervical spine apparatus examine head-neck-coordination construct . Each patient test surgery , postoperative well 3 12 month follow-up . Hypothesis patient MIS-approaches perform well head-neck-coordination patient open approach .
